page.title: 08Public Parks & Open Spaces.
page.content: As well as the woods considered elsewhere and several small recreation grounds, there are 3 important{open {spaces}in the area: 1){John Burrows Recreation Ground}. 2){Belfairs Woods}. 3){Hadleigh Downs}. John Burrows Recreation ground and Belfairs Park both have{playing fields and{tennis courts}but Belfairs also has a{golf course}and a{trotting {track}set among extensive woodlands. The horse-riding facilities include a {riding school for the disabled. The pasture and woods at Hadleigh Downs offer fine views and contain the ruins of Hadleigh Castle. Although this land is farmed, access is good via several public footpaths. Plans to develop this area as a{country park} have made little progress to date.
